title: For everyone complaining about that RIOT "always" uses the three hit thing, consider this:
body:
Actually the "do 3 hits and stuff happens" mechanic is not the most used one in the latest releases. 

Kindred will be the first Champion since febuary 2014, whos Q is NOT a straight line short CD Skilshot with bonus effect. 
Yep, that mechanic has been on every release for the last 9 CHAMPION! 
The last one who didnt have a "straight line slowing (most used bonus effect) Q skillshot" was Yasuo!

Actually... if we would say that Yasuos whirlwind counts (even thought its not short CD then) and ignore that Jinx and Aatrox straight line slowing skillshot" isnt Q, the last champion we have without a straight line low CD Skillshot with bonus effekt was NAMI! Released **December 2012** 
Thats 18 Champions in a row.


I for my part are just happy that this is gone...

Skillshots are nothing new to champs, the other thing was. Now it just feels overused. Sorry but these are not the same, and kind of a stretch to compare them.
